rule: If it is impossible to determine the part-of-speech tag for the given word in the context of the provided sentence, the output must be exactly "CantAnswer" without any additional characters or text.
input: Sentence: 'The old man the boat.' Word: 'man'
validityText:

According to the input specification, the word must be present in the provided sentence. On examining the sentence, the word 'man' is indeed present within it. There are no restrictions or requirements on the nature of the sentence or the characteristics of the word other than it must be present in the sentence. Thus, the input complies with the input specification.

OK
